sentences.cn: 以失败告终的第一次婚姻

sentences.en: Carelessness in driving often results in disastrous accidents.
sentences.cn: 开车时粗心大意常造成严重事故.

sentences.en: England's cricketers have had another disastrous day.
sentences.cn: 英格兰板球队又经历了灰色的一天。

sentences.en: Her investment had disastrous consequences: she lost everything she owned.
sentences.cn: 她的投资结果很惨, 血本无归 .

sentences.en: His original idea was good, but his execution of the scheme was disastrous.
sentences.cn: 他的设想很好, 但实行起来却糟糕透顶.

sentences.en: If word got out now, a scandal could be disastrous.
sentences.cn: 如果消息现在传出去，可能会是灾难性的丑闻。

sentences.en: Lowering interest rates could have disastrous consequences for the economy.
sentences.cn: 降低利率可能给经济带来灾难性后果。

sentences.en: Napoleon's army was sacrificed on the altar of folly in the disastrous Russian campaign.
sentences.cn: 在灾难性的俄国战役中，拿破仑的军队成了这一愚蠢之举的牺牲品。

sentences.en: Some of the blame for the disastrous night must be shouldered by the promoters.
sentences.cn: 筹办方必须为那个灾难性的夜晚承担一部分责任。

sentences.en: The effect on coffee prices has been disastrous for the producers.
sentences.cn: 对咖啡价格的影响对生产商而言是灾难性的。

sentences.en: The heavy rainstorm caused a disastrous flood.
The move proved disastrous (= was disastrous ) for the company.
sentences.cn: 这一行动对公司来说是一场灾难。

sentences.en: The next thing I did was even more disastrous.
They told Jacques Delors a disastrous world trade war must be avoided at all costs.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉雅克·德洛尔必须不惜任何代价避免一场毁灭性的世界贸易战。

sentences.en: This had been a disastrous week for Prime Minister Major.
sentences.cn: 这对于梅杰首相来说是灾难性的一周。

sentences.en: Two of the world's top four computer manufacturers have announced a shotgun wedding prompted by slumping sales and disastrous financial losses.
sentences.cn: 世界四大计算机制造商中的两家因销量锐减和严重亏损已闪电宣布合并。

trans.tran_en: very bad, or ending in failure
